name: 5SecsSwap
description:
Tried to create it in 3 hours... Ended up spending 6 hours on it! Kinda rushed at the end, but it was fun anyway!

An arcade game inspired by the Atari 2600 era where you try to survive against waves of swordsmen and gunners... but every 5 seconds, your weapon swaps! Use the RedGun against every red mobs and use the BlueSword against every blue mobs.

Controls:

  • Arrows to move.
  • Space to attack with BlueSword, or shoot with RedGun.

Made by:

  • Veevoy
  • WLHib (alias Wav_le_hib)

Assets used:

  • https://freesound.org/people/nomiqbomi/sounds/579067/
  • https://freesound.org/people/Daleonfire/sounds/505235/
